Premier Projects

Hydrotreater Process Control, Analytics, and LIMS Systems

Jaxon Energy teamed up with Corso Systems to develop a new control and information system for its Jackson, MS hydrotreating plant. Jaxon leveraged Rockwell Automation's FactoryTalk software suite for robust operator control of the plant and secure remote access to real-time information.
SCADA System for multiple solar sites producing 109MW

Designed and implemented a standardized SCADA system for a solar power generation company put into use at multiple facilities generating 109MW of total power.

Database Management

Cement Manufacturing Process Analytics           

A cement manufacturing facility worked with us to implement a process historian and data visualization tools for its R&D pilot plant.
Solar Facility Commissioning with Custom Data Monitoring Website

Commissioned three solar facilities and developed a customized monitoring and reporting website for internal use and public access.
Historian for a Mineral Processing Company          

Implemented FactoryTalk VantagePoint and FactoryTalk Historian to store and analyze process data at multiple facilities for a leading diatomaceous earth processing company.
SCADA System for multiple solar sites producing 109MW

Designed and implemented a standardized SCADA system for a solar power generation company put into use at multiple facilities generating 109MW of total power.
Production Data Management system for a mining Company

A leading diatomaceous earth processing company worked with us to design and implement a production data management system to track manually entered data
Wonderware Historian to FactoryTalk Historian Migration

Migrated an existing Wonderware Historian installation to a FactoryTalk Historian with no loss of data.
Process Change Management System for a mining company

Our staff worked with a leading diatomaceous earth processing facility to implement a centralized, web-based Process Change Management System.
